timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: This call to String.startsWith can be rewritten using String.charAt(0)
timeline.author: dev-dotcms

timeline.bodyText: Codacy found an issue: Avoid declaring a variable if it is unreferenced before a possible exit point.
